about_the_game:
Your species has mastered the seemingly impossible. Faster than light travel means a new era for your civilization. Your teeming planet can now send brave pioneers to settle distant worlds. Your scientists work at breakneck speed unlocking new secrets of the cosmos and analyzing anomalies that defy expectations. But you are neither the first, nor the only, species to climb to the heavens. You must test your military and diplomatic prowess against rival galactic empires.

To celebrate the one year anniversary of Stellaris, Paradox is giving away the pre-order exclusive "Creatures of the Void" (portrait pack) and a new "Anniversary Species Portrait Pack" to all Stellaris players as a thank you for your support over the last year.

Creatures of the Void includes five alien portraits:


  • Hydra/Xenomorph
  • Evil Porcupine
  • Dinosaur Bird
  • Shadowy Anthropoid
  • Fungoid Infected Mammalian

Anniversary Species Portrait Pack includes three new alien portraits:


  • Fairy Dragon
  • Peacock Avian
  • Larvae
detailed_description:
Your species has mastered the seemingly impossible. Faster than light travel means a new era for your civilization. Your teeming planet can now send brave pioneers to settle distant worlds. Your scientists work at breakneck speed unlocking new secrets of the cosmos and analyzing anomalies that defy expectations. But you are neither the first, nor the only, species to climb to the heavens. You must test your military and diplomatic prowess against rival galactic empires.

To celebrate the one year anniversary of Stellaris, Paradox is giving away the pre-order exclusive "Creatures of the Void" (portrait pack) and a new "Anniversary Species Portrait Pack" to all Stellaris players as a thank you for your support over the last year.

Creatures of the Void includes five alien portraits:


  • Hydra/Xenomorph
  • Evil Porcupine
  • Dinosaur Bird
  • Shadowy Anthropoid
  • Fungoid Infected Mammalian

Anniversary Species Portrait Pack includes three new alien portraits:

  • Larvae

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 x64
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X4 640 @ 3.0 Ghz / or Intel Core 2 Quad 9400 @ 2.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 5770 / or Nvidia GTX 460, with 1024MB VRAM. Latest available proprietary drivers from both manufacturers.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 x64
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 850 @ 3.3 Ghz / or Intel i3 2100 @ 3.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 6850 / or Nvidia GTX 560TI, with 1024MB VRAM (Latest available proprietary drivers from both manufacturers)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i5-4570S
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GT 750M or equivalent AMD® card with 1GB Vram
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i5-4670
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 780M with 4GB Vram
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer

name: Stellaris: Anniversary Portraits

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x86 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Athlon II X4 640 @ 3.0 Ghz / or Intel Core 2 Quad 9400 @ 2.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 5770 / or Nvidia GTX 460, with 1024MB VRAM. Latest available WHQL drivers from both manufacturers.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c- compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64 or newer
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 850 @ 3.3 Ghz or Intel i3 2100 @ 3.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 6850 / or Nvidia GTX 560TI, with 1024MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.

supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean
